entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @realDonaldTrump Wow! Cities are burning. The WH is fenced in like a prison. Protesters are marching. Police brutality videos are all over social media. We're close to 2 million Covid-19 cases with over 112 K deaths yet Trump has a 96% Approval Rating in the @GOP? Is this making America great?
